activities.title: Haneda Airside Food + Convenience Store Run
activities.description: No visa or it’s late? Stay in the airport and do Japanese snacks, coffee, desserts, and a terminal walk. Keywords: airside, late night, food, easy.

activities.title: Haneda Observation Deck (Planes + Skyline)
activities.description: Quick ‘sights’ without leaving the airport: runway views, plane spotting, photos. Keywords: observation deck, photos, planes, easy.

activities.title: Odaiba Seaside Park + Rainbow Bridge Views
activities.description: High photo payoff, lower time risk than deep Tokyo. Seaside walk + skyline. Keywords: photos, skyline, seaside, chill sightseeing.

activities.title: Asakusa (Senso-ji Temple) Quick Culture Run
activities.description: Temple culture + street vibes + souvenir shopping + snacks. Strong ‘culture’ and ‘sights’ pick. Keywords: temple, culture, street, souvenirs, photos.

activities.title: Shibuya Crossing + Hachiko + Quick Street Walk
activities.description: Max Tokyo vibe in minimal time. Crossing, photos, quick shopping, food nearby. Keywords: shibuya, photos, city vibe, sights, shopping.

activities.title: Tsukiji Outer Market (Food-focused)
activities.description: Food mission: sushi, snacks, market browsing. Best daytime. Keywords: food, sushi, market, street food.

activities.title: Airport Lounge / Shower Reset (Haneda)
activities.description: Comfort option when it’s overnight or you want to reset instead of sightseeing. Keywords: relax, shower, lounge, rest.

activities.title: Transit Hotel / Sleep Block (Haneda)
activities.description: SLEEP ONLY. Recommend only when user explicitly wants sleep/nap/rest or it’s overnight + late arrival. Keywords: sleep, nap, bed, overnight, rest.
